mapper.select: SELECT GAME_INDEX,POSITION_NAME,TIME_INDEX,M.PHOTO,G.MEMBER_INDEX FROM GAME G LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON G.MEMBER_INDEX LIKE M.MEMBER_INDEX WHERE G.TIME_INDEX LIKE #{stadiumIndex} ORDER BY G.GAME_INDEX;
SELECT GAME_INDEX FROM GAME WHERE TIME_INDEX = #{timeIndex} AND POSITION_NAME = '${positionName}';
SELECT count(MEMBER_INDEX) FROM GAME where time_index = #{value};
SELECT MEMBER_INDEX FROM GAME where time_index = #{value};
